name: Skate'n'Snipe
description:
Skate your way across the roofs and snipe the cyber terrorists.

Avoid falling, shoot the targets (red) and protect the civilians (blue).

Controls:
Spacebar to Jump
Right mouse button to aim then left mouse button to shoot

Made for Ludum Dare 41. Tools : Unity (game), Renoise (music and sounds), Paint.Net (graphics)
